previous.excerpt: Resume Work helps thousands of job seeking people create a job-worthy resume. With Impact, you'll get a fast, and well designed resume for your job application.
previous.title: Resume Work - Create a job-worthy resume for free

localize.description: Resume Work帮助数以千计的求职者创建一份值得信赖的简历。有了Impact，您将得到一份快速、精心设计的求职简历。
localize.tagline: 免费制作一份有工作价值的简历

localize.description: Resume Work幫助數以千計的求職者創建一份值得信賴的簡歷。有了Impact，您將得到一份快速、精心設計的求職簡歷。
localize.tagline: 免費製作一份有工作價值的簡歷

next.excerpt: It's been a long 2020, eh? 🥵 Sometimes, thanking someone for going above and beyond their ways to help you is not enough. Send them a "kudos" in a public Slack channel to share their awesomeness with everyone and spread a bit of positivity. 🚀
next.title: Kudosbot - Your friendly neighbourhood kudos spreader.

localize.description: 这是一个漫长的2020年，嗯？🥵 有时候，感谢一个人对你的帮助是远远不够的。在公共Slack频道里给他们发个 "赞"，和大家一起分享他们的精彩，传播一点正能量。🚀
localize.tagline: 你的友好邻居的赞誉传播者。

localize.description: 這是一個漫長的2020年，嗯？🥵 有時候，感謝一個人對你的幫助是遠遠不夠的。在公共Slack頻道里給他們發個 "贊"，和大家一起分享他們的精彩，傳播一點正能量。🚀
localize.tagline: 你的友好鄰居的讚譽傳播者。
